sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1),M.NODE_ID FROM sys_menu M WHERE M.NODE_URL = #NODE_URL# GROUP BY M.NODE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pub_menu_useinfo T WHERE T.STAFF_ID = #STAFF_ID# AND T.UNIT_ID = #UNIT_ID# AND T.ROLE_ID = #ROLE_ID# AND T.MENU_ID = #MENU_ID#
sqlMap.update: update pub_menu_useinfo T set T.USER_COUNT = T.USER_COUNT+1 WHERE T.STAFF_ID = #STAFF_ID# AND T.UNIT_ID = #UNIT_ID# AND T.ROLE_ID = #ROLE_ID# AND T.MENU_ID = #MENU_ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.USER_COUNT,T.MENU_ID,SYS_MENU.NODE_NAME FROM pub_menu_useinfo T LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON T.MENU_ID = SYS_MENU.NODE_ID WHERE T.STAFF_ID = #STAFF_ID# AND T.UNIT_ID = #UNIT_ID# AND T.ROLE_ID = #ROLE_ID# ORDER BY T.USER_COUNT DESC) U

SELECT '1' SAVED,T.SEQ,T.MENU_ID,SYS_MENU.NODE_NAME,SYS_MENU.NODE_URL,SYS_MENU.NODE_IMG,SYS_MENU.NODE_CMD FROM pub_staff_quick_menu T LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON T.MENU_ID = SYS_MENU.NODE_ID WHERE T.STAFF_ID = #STAFF_ID# AND T.UNIT_ID = #UNIT_ID# T.ROLE_ID = #ROLE_ID# ORDER BY T.SEQ ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE pub_staff_quick_menu T set T.SEQ = #SEQ# WHERE T.STAFF_ID = #STAFF_ID# AND T.UNIT_ID = #UNIT_ID# AND T.ROLE_ID = #ROLE_ID# AND T.MENU_ID = #MENU_ID#
sqlMap.delete: delete from pub_staff_quick_menu where STAFF_ID = #STAFF_ID# AND UNIT_ID = #UNIT_ID# AND ROLE_ID = #ROLE_ID# AND MENU_ID = #MENU_ID#
